content: create your very own adorable amigurumi monkey with this easy-level crochet pattern mischief the monkey is perfect for crocheters of all ages who love making cute and cuddly toys > > grab an ad-free printable version of > this pattern here in my ravelry shop > or here https //tidd ly/454tzs7 in my etsy shop > > unlike the free version of this > pattern that is available on my blog > this downloadable pdf is ad-free and > includes exclusive photo tutorials for > trickier parts of the pattern that > the free version does not > **pattern details ** **skill level ** easy **language ** english **terminology ** us crochet terms **finished size ** approximately 18 5 inches tall from bottom of feet to top of head when crocheted to gauge **materials needed ** 6 0 mm j crochet hook hobbii toucan yarn super bulky color a dark purple col 19 - 2 balls color b light purple col 17 - 1 ball 18mm violet glitter safety eyes polyfil stuffing scissors tapestry needle stitch markers sewing pins **follow me on social media to see behind the scenes of new upcoming designs and giveaways ** **instagram ** www instagram com/theloopylamb https //www instagram com/theloopylamb **facebook ** www facebook com/theloopylamb https //www facebook com/theloopylamb **pinterest ** www pinterest com/theloopylamb https //www pinterest com/theloopylamb **youtube ** check out my youtube channel https //www youtube com/channel/ucd4hdqudbfqqbbgm-bo7myg view_as=subscriber **blog ** www theloopylamb com http //www theloopylamb com/ **disclaimer ** feel free to sell the item created by this pattern but please provide pattern credit back to me when posting online and please provide a link to my blog http //www theloopylamb com http //www theloopylamb com/ please do not resell distribute duplicate or share this pattern in any printed or digital form or claim this pattern as your own original design please do not use my photos when selling your finished items please note that due to the nature of digital downloads i do not offer refunds on the purchase of digital downloads if you have any questions at all about the pattern please feel free to send me a message through ravelry or via email ashley@theloopylamb com mailto ashley@theloopylamb com
